articles.title: US official: Israeli-owned ship targeted in suspected Iranian attack in Indian Ocean - POLITICO
articles.description: Iranian-backed militias in Iraq also have launched attacks on American troops in both Iraq and Syria during the war.
articles.content: We continue to monitor the situation closely, the official said. The official declined to elaborate on what intelligence the U.S. military gathered to assess Iran was behind the attack, though author… [+3420 chars]
